name: stars - PSF + saturation
author: FabriceNeyret2
description:
How to draw stars as in astronomic photos ?
Stars are only a fraction of pixel, but hugely brighter than the max pixel value, plus the lens PSF causes bloom. So the disk you see (L) is just a clamped bloom r~=1/d^2/3, not a projected sphere r~=1/d (R).
